txt.en:
'Could it be that my Dírdrë still lives?

'It may be too much to hope for, but if you did not see her in Carn Dûm, perhaps they took her into Nan Gurth?

'Please, I beg you to go there and search for her. Nan Gurth lies to the south and east.'
'A saviour to guide me home? Thank you, stranger! We must leave this horrid place at once!'
'Is it possible that Dírdrë yet lives?'
The bracelet you found belonged to a girl of the Hillmen called Dírdrë. Her mother wonders if she could still be alive.
Dírdrë might be found in Nan Gurth, south-east of Carn Dûm.\n\nÉa's daughter was taken from her many years ago. It could be that Dírdrë still lives.
